title: International Literature Award
text:
International Literature Award ("German": Internationaler Literaturpreis – Haus der Kulturen der Welt) is a German <a href="literary%20award">literary award</a> for international prose translated into German for the first time. The prize has been awarded annually by the <a href="Haus%20der%20Kulturen%20der%20Welt">Haus der Kulturen der Welt</a> and the foundation “Elementarteilchen” since 2009. Winning authors receive €20,000 and the translators €15,000. The award has compared as the German near-equivalent of the <a href="Best%20Translated%20Book%20Award">Best Translated Book Award</a> or <a href="Independent%20Foreign%20Fiction%20Prize">Independent Foreign Fiction Prize</a>.
